data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cunha, Carlo M., Santos, Franklin N., Lima, Silvio F. B. (2016): New species of the genus Elachisina (Gastropoda: Elachisinidae) from northeastern Brazil. Zootaxa 4139 (1): 131-134, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4139.1.9
